name: Kiko Mendes: School Schooting Simulator
description:
version: Alpha-2

In this game you play as a school-shooter named Kiko Mendes and kill people.

!!!!DISCLAIMER!!!!

if you got offended playing this, maybe youre not meant to play the game.

every character made in this game is fictional and not meant to portrait anything or anyone in real life.

ENJOY!!!
